syntaxParseTools

Class CFGTreeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • syntaxParseTools.CFGTreeNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Node<CFGTreeNode>

    public class CFGTreeNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements Node<CFGTreeNode>
    A node in a CFGTree. Has a label, an indexed unique label, leaf text (iff it is a leaf node in the tree), 1 or 0 parents, and 0 or more children.
    Author:
    glpayson

    • Constructor Detail

      • CFGTreeNode

        public CFGTreeNode(java.lang.String label,
           CFGTreeNode parent)
        Convenience constructor which sets the node's indexed unique label to its label.
        Used if assigning unique labels to nodes is unnecessary.
        Parameters:
        label - the nodes label and unique label
        parent - the nodes parent node

      • CFGTreeNode

        public CFGTreeNode(java.lang.String label,
           java.lang.String sentenceUniqueLabel,
           CFGTreeNode parent)
        Parameters:
        label - the nodes label as it appeared in the parse String
        sentenceUniqueLabel - an indexed unique label
        parent - the node's parent node

      • CFGTreeNode

        public CFGTreeNode(java.lang.String label,
           java.lang.String sentenceUniqueLabel,
           java.lang.String leafText,
           CFGTreeNode parent)
        Parameters:
        label - the nodes label as it appeared in the parse String
        sentenceUniqueLabel - an indexed unique label
        leafText - leaf text as it appeared in the parse String
        parent - the node's parent node

      • getLeafText

        public java.lang.String getLeafText()
        NOTE: Returns an empty String if this is not a leaf node. Clients of this method should perform appropriate checks to the returned value.
        Returns:
        this node's leaf text or an empty String

        public boolean isLeaf()
